)

// ConfigTemplate is an object representing the database table.
type ConfigTemplate struct {
	ID        int       `boil:"id" json:"id" toml:"id" yaml:"id"`
	Title     string    `boil:"title" json:"title" toml:"title" yaml:"title"`
	Config    string    `boil:"config" json:"config" toml:"config" yaml:"config"`
	CreatedAt time.Time `boil:"created_at" json:"created_at" toml:"created_at" yaml:"created_at"`

	R *configTemplateR `boil:"-" json:"-" toml:"-" yaml:"-"`
	L configTemplateL  `boil:"-" json:"-" toml:"-" yaml:"-"`
}

var ConfigTemplateColumns = struct {
	ID        string
	Title     string
	Config    string
	CreatedAt string
}{
	ID:        "id",
	Title:     "title",
	Config:    "config",
	CreatedAt: "created_at",
}

// Generated where

var ConfigTemplateWhere = struct {
	ID        whereHelperint
	Title     whereHelperstring
	Config    whereHelperstring
	CreatedAt whereHelpertime_Time
}{
	ID:        whereHelperint{field: "\"config_templates\".\"id\""},
	Title:     whereHelperstring{field: "\"config_templates\".\"title\""},
	Config:    whereHelperstring{field: "\"config_templates\".\"config\""},
	CreatedAt: whereHelpertime_Time{field: "\"config_templates\".\"created_at\""},
}

var ConfigTemplateRels = struct {
}{}

// configTemplateR is where relationships are stored.
type configTemplateR struct {
}

// NewStruct creates a new relationship struct
func (*configTemplateR) NewStruct() *configTemplateR {
	return &configTemplateR{}
}

// configTemplateL is where Load methods for each relationship are stored.
type configTemplateL struct{}

var (
	configTemplateAllColumns            = []string{"id", "title", "config", "created_at"}
	configTemplateColumnsWithoutDefault = []string{"title", "config"}
	configTemplateColumnsWithDefault    = []string{"id", "created_at"}
	configTemplatePrimaryKeyColumns     = []string{"id"}
)

type (
	// ConfigTemplateSlice is an alias for a slice of pointers to ConfigTemplate.
	// This should generally be used opposed to []ConfigTemplate.
	ConfigTemplateSlice []*ConfigTemplate
	// ConfigTemplateHook is the signature for custom ConfigTemplate hook methods
	ConfigTemplateHook func(context.Context, boil.ContextExecutor, *ConfigTemplate) error

	configTemplateQuery struct {
		*queries.Query
	}
)

// Cache for insert, update and upsert
var (
	configTemplateType                 = reflect.TypeOf(&ConfigTemplate{})
	configTemplateMapping              = queries.MakeStructMapping(configTemplateType)
	configTemplatePrimaryKeyMapping, _ = queries.BindMapping(configTemplateType, configTemplateMapping, configTemplatePrimaryKeyColumns)
	configTemplateInsertCacheMut       sync.RWMutex
	configTemplateInsertCache          = make(map[string]insertCache)
	configTemplateUpdateCacheMut       sync.RWMutex
	configTemplateUpdateCache          = make(map[string]updateCache)
	configTemplateUpsertCacheMut       sync.RWMutex
	configTemplateUpsertCache          = make(map[string]insertCache)
)

var (
	// Force time package dependency for automated UpdatedAt/CreatedAt.
	_ = time.Second
	// Force qmhelper dependency for where clause generation (which doesn't
	// always happen)
	_ = qmhelper.Where
)

var configTemplateBeforeUpdateHooks []ConfigTemplateHook
var configTemplateBeforeDeleteHooks []ConfigTemplateHook
var configTemplateBeforeUpsertHooks []ConfigTemplateHook

var configTemplateAfterInsertHooks []ConfigTemplateHook
var configTemplateAfterSelectHooks []ConfigTemplateHook
var configTemplateAfterUpdateHooks []ConfigTemplateHook
var configTemplateAfterDeleteHooks []ConfigTemplateHook
var configTemplateAfterUpsertHooks []ConfigTemplateHook

// doBeforeInsertHooks executes all "before insert" hooks.
func (o *ConfigTemplate) doBeforeInsertHooks(ctx context.Context, exec boil.ContextExecutor) (err error) {
	if boil.HooksAreSkipped(ctx) {
		return nil
	}

	for _, hook := range configTemplateBeforeInsertHooks {
		if err := hook(ctx, exec, o); err != nil {
			return err
		}
	}

	return nil
}

	if boil.HooksAreSkipped(ctx) {
		return nil
	}

	for _, hook := range configTemplateBeforeUpdateHooks {
		if err := hook(ctx, exec, o); err != nil {
			return err
		}
	}

	return nil
}

	if boil.HooksAreSkipped(ctx) {
		return nil
	}

	for _, hook := range configTemplateBeforeDeleteHooks {
		if err := hook(ctx, exec, o); err != nil {
			return err
		}
	}

	return nil
}

	if boil.HooksAreSkipped(ctx) {
		return nil

	for _, hook := range configTemplateBeforeUpsertHooks {
		if err := hook(ctx, exec, o); err != nil {
			return err
		}
	}

	return nil
}

// doAfterInsertHooks executes all "after Insert" hooks.
func (o *ConfigTemplate) doAfterInsertHooks(ctx context.Context, exec boil.ContextExecutor) (err error) {
	if boil.HooksAreSkipped(ctx) {
		return nil
	}

	for _, hook := range configTemplateAfterInsertHooks {
		if err := hook(ctx, exec, o); err != nil {
			return err
		}
	}

	return nil
}

	if boil.HooksAreSkipped(ctx) {
		return nil

	for _, hook := range configTemplateAfterSelectHooks {
		if err := hook(ctx, exec, o); err != nil {
			return err
		}
	}

	return nil
}

// doAfterUpsertHooks executes all "after Upsert" hooks.

	if boil.HooksAreSkipped(ctx) {
		return nil

// AddConfigTemplateHook registers your hook function for all future operations.
func AddConfigTemplateHook(hookPoint boil.HookPoint, configTemplateHook ConfigTemplateHook) {
	switch hookPoint {
	case boil.BeforeInsertHook:
		configTemplateBeforeInsertHooks = append(configTemplateBeforeInsertHooks, configTemplateHook)
	case boil.BeforeUpdateHook:
		configTemplateBeforeUpdateHooks = append(configTemplateBeforeUpdateHooks, configTemplateHook)
	case boil.BeforeDeleteHook:
		configTemplateBeforeDeleteHooks = append(configTemplateBeforeDeleteHooks, configTemplateHook)
	case boil.BeforeUpsertHook:
		configTemplateBeforeUpsertHooks = append(configTemplateBeforeUpsertHooks, configTemplateHook)
	case boil.AfterInsertHook:
		configTemplateAfterInsertHooks = append(configTemplateAfterInsertHooks, configTemplateHook)
	case boil.AfterSelectHook:
		configTemplateAfterSelectHooks = append(configTemplateAfterSelectHooks, configTemplateHook)
	case boil.AfterUpdateHook:
		configTemplateAfterUpdateHooks = append(configTemplateAfterUpdateHooks, configTemplateHook)
	case boil.AfterDeleteHook:
		configTemplateAfterDeleteHooks = append(configTemplateAfterDeleteHooks, configTemplateHook)
	case boil.AfterUpsertHook:
		configTemplateAfterUpsertHooks = append(configTemplateAfterUpsertHooks, configTemplateHook)
	}
}

// One returns a single configTemplate record from the query.
func (q configTemplateQuery) One(ctx context.Context, exec boil.ContextExecutor) (*ConfigTemplate, error) {
	o := &ConfigTemplate{}

	queries.SetLimit(q.Query, 1)

	err := q.Bind(ctx, exec, o)
	if err != nil {
		if errors.Cause(err) == sql.ErrNoRows {
			return nil, sql.ErrNoRows
		}
		return nil, errors.Wrap(err, "models: failed to execute a one query for config_templates")
	}

	if err := o.doAfterSelectHooks(ctx, exec); err != nil {
		return o, err
	}

	return o, nil
}

// All returns all ConfigTemplate records from the query.
func (q configTemplateQuery) All(ctx context.Context, exec boil.ContextExecutor) (ConfigTemplateSlice, error) {
	var o []*ConfigTemplate

	err := q.Bind(ctx, exec, &o)
	if err != nil {
		return nil, errors.Wrap(err, "models: failed to assign all query results to ConfigTemplate slice")
	}

	if len(configTemplateAfterSelectHooks) != 0 {
		for _, obj := range o {
			if err := obj.doAfterSelectHooks(ctx, exec); err != nil {
				return o, err
			}
		}
	}

	return o, nil
}

// Count returns the count of all ConfigTemplate records in the query.
func (q configTemplateQuery) Count(ctx context.Context, exec boil.ContextExecutor) (int64, error) {
	var count int64

	queries.SetSelect(q.Query, nil)
	queries.SetCount(q.Query)

	err := q.Query.QueryRowContext(ctx, exec).Scan(&count)
	if err != nil {
		return 0, errors.Wrap(err, "models: failed to count config_templates rows")
	}

	return count, nil
}

// Exists checks if the row exists in the table.
func (q configTemplateQuery) Exists(ctx context.Context, exec boil.ContextExecutor) (bool, error) {
	var count int64

	queries.SetSelect(q.Query, nil)
	queries.SetCount(q.Query)
	queries.SetLimit(q.Query, 1)

	err := q.Query.QueryRowContext(ctx, exec).Scan(&count)
	if err != nil {
		return false, errors.Wrap(err, "models: failed to check if config_templates exists")
	}

	return count > 0, nil
}

// ConfigTemplates retrieves all the records using an executor.
func ConfigTemplates(mods ...qm.QueryMod) configTemplateQuery {
	mods = append(mods, qm.From("\"config_templates\""))
	return configTemplateQuery{NewQuery(mods...)}
}

// FindConfigTemplate retrieves a single record by ID with an executor.
// If selectCols is empty Find will return all columns.
func FindConfigTemplate(ctx context.Context, exec boil.ContextExecutor, iD int, selectCols ...string) (*ConfigTemplate, error) {
	configTemplateObj := &ConfigTemplate{}

	sel := "*"
	if len(selectCols) > 0 {
		sel = strings.Join(strmangle.IdentQuoteSlice(dialect.LQ, dialect.RQ, selectCols), ",")
	}
	query := fmt.Sprintf(
		"select %s from \"config_templates\" where \"id\"=$1", sel,
	)

	q := queries.Raw(query, iD)

	err := q.Bind(ctx, exec, configTemplateObj)
	if err != nil {
		if errors.Cause(err) == sql.ErrNoRows {
			return nil, sql.ErrNoRows
		}
		return nil, errors.Wrap(err, "models: unable to select from config_templates")
	}

	return configTemplateObj, nil
}

// Insert a single record using an executor.
// See boil.Columns.InsertColumnSet documentation to understand column list inference for inserts.
func (o *ConfigTemplate) Insert(ctx context.Context, exec boil.ContextExecutor, columns boil.Columns) error {
	if o == nil {
		return errors.New("models: no config_templates provided for insertion")
	}

	var err error
	if !boil.TimestampsAreSkipped(ctx) {
		currTime := time.Now().In(boil.GetLocation())

		if o.CreatedAt.IsZero() {
			o.CreatedAt = currTime
		}
	}

	if err := o.doBeforeInsertHooks(ctx, exec); err != nil {
		return err
	}

	nzDefaults := queries.NonZeroDefaultSet(configTemplateColumnsWithDefault, o)

	key := makeCacheKey(columns, nzDefaults)
	configTemplateInsertCacheMut.RLock()
	cache, cached := configTemplateInsertCache[key]
	configTemplateInsertCacheMut.RUnlock()

	if !cached {
		wl, returnColumns := columns.InsertColumnSet(
			configTemplateAllColumns,
			configTemplateColumnsWithDefault,
			configTemplateColumnsWithoutDefault,
			nzDefaults,
		)

		cache.valueMapping, err = queries.BindMapping(configTemplateType, configTemplateMapping, wl)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		cache.retMapping, err = queries.BindMapping(configTemplateType, configTemplateMapping, returnColumns)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		if len(wl) != 0 {
			cache.query = fmt.Sprintf("INSERT INTO \"config_templates\" (\"%s\") %%sVALUES (%s)%%s", strings.Join(wl, "\",\""), strmangle.Placeholders(dialect.UseIndexPlaceholders, len(wl), 1, 1))
		} else {
			cache.query = "INSERT INTO \"config_templates\" %sDEFAULT VALUES%s"
		}

		var queryOutput, queryReturning string

		if len(cache.retMapping) != 0 {
			queryReturning = fmt.Sprintf(" RETURNING \"%s\"", strings.Join(returnColumns, "\",\""))
		}

		cache.query = fmt.Sprintf(cache.query, queryOutput, queryReturning)
	}

	value := reflect.Indirect(reflect.ValueOf(o))
	vals := queries.ValuesFromMapping(value, cache.valueMapping)

	if boil.IsDebug(ctx) {
		writer := boil.DebugWriterFrom(ctx)
		fmt.Fprintln(writer, cache.query)
		fmt.Fprintln(writer, vals)
	}

	if len(cache.retMapping) != 0 {
		err = exec.QueryRowContext(ctx, cache.query, vals...).Scan(queries.PtrsFromMapping(value, cache.retMapping)...)
	} else {
		_, err = exec.ExecContext(ctx, cache.query, vals...)
	}

	if err != nil {
		return errors.Wrap(err, "models: unable to insert into config_templates")
	}

	if !cached {
		configTemplateInsertCacheMut.Lock()
		configTemplateInsertCache[key] = cache
		configTemplateInsertCacheMut.Unlock()
	}

	return o.doAfterInsertHooks(ctx, exec)
}

// Update uses an executor to update the ConfigTemplate.
// See boil.Columns.UpdateColumnSet documentation to understand column list inference for updates.
// Update does not automatically update the record in case of default values. Use .Reload() to refresh the records.
func (o *ConfigTemplate) Update(ctx context.Context, exec boil.ContextExecutor, columns boil.Columns) (int64, error) {
	var err error
	if err = o.doBeforeUpdateHooks(ctx, exec); err != nil {
		return 0, err
	}
	key := makeCacheKey(columns, nil)
	configTemplateUpdateCacheMut.RLock()
	cache, cached := configTemplateUpdateCache[key]
	configTemplateUpdateCacheMut.RUnlock()

	if !cached {
		wl := columns.UpdateColumnSet(
			configTemplateAllColumns,
			configTemplatePrimaryKeyColumns,
		)

		if !columns.IsWhitelist() {
			wl = strmangle.SetComplement(wl, []string{"created_at"})
		}
		if len(wl) == 0 {
			return 0, errors.New("models: unable to update config_templates, could not build whitelist")
		}

		cache.query = fmt.Sprintf("UPDATE \"config_templates\" SET %s WHERE %s",
			strmangle.SetParamNames("\"", "\"", 1, wl),
			strmangle.WhereClause("\"", "\"", len(wl)+1, configTemplatePrimaryKeyColumns),
		)
		cache.valueMapping, err = queries.BindMapping(configTemplateType, configTemplateMapping, append(wl, configTemplatePrimaryKeyColumns...))
		if err != nil {
			return 0, err
		}
	}

	values := queries.ValuesFromMapping(reflect.Indirect(reflect.ValueOf(o)), cache.valueMapping)

	if boil.IsDebug(ctx) {
		writer := boil.DebugWriterFrom(ctx)
		fmt.Fprintln(writer, cache.query)
		fmt.Fprintln(writer, values)
	}
	var result sql.Result
	result, err = exec.ExecContext(ctx, cache.query, values...)
	if err != nil {
		return 0, errors.Wrap(err, "models: unable to update config_templates row")
	}

	rowsAff, err := result.RowsAffected()
	if err != nil {
		return 0, errors.Wrap(err, "models: failed to get rows affected by update for config_templates")
	}

	if !cached {
		configTemplateUpdateCacheMut.Lock()
		configTemplateUpdateCache[key] = cache
		configTemplateUpdateCacheMut.Unlock()
	}

	return rowsAff, o.doAfterUpdateHooks(ctx, exec)
}

// UpdateAll updates all rows with the specified column values.
func (q configTemplateQuery) UpdateAll(ctx context.Context, exec boil.ContextExecutor, cols M) (int64, error) {
	queries.SetUpdate(q.Query, cols)

	result, err := q.Query.ExecContext(ctx, exec)
	if err != nil {
		return 0, errors.Wrap(err, "models: unable to update all for config_templates")
	}

	rowsAff, err := result.RowsAffected()
	if err != nil {
		return 0, errors.Wrap(err, "models: unable to retrieve rows affected for config_templates")
	}

	return rowsAff, nil
}

// UpdateAll updates all rows with the specified column values, using an executor.
func (o ConfigTemplateSlice) UpdateAll(ctx context.Context, exec boil.ContextExecutor, cols M) (int64, error) {
	ln := int64(len(o))
	if ln == 0 {
		return 0, nil
	}

	if len(cols) == 0 {
		return 0, errors.New("models: update all requires at least one column argument")
	}

	colNames := make([]string, len(cols))
	args := make([]interface{}, len(cols))

	i := 0
	for name, value := range cols {
		colNames[i] = name
		args[i] = value
		i++
	}

	// Append all of the primary key values for each column
	for _, obj := range o {
		pkeyArgs := queries.ValuesFromMapping(reflect.Indirect(reflect.ValueOf(obj)), configTemplatePrimaryKeyMapping)
		args = append(args, pkeyArgs...)
	}

	sql := fmt.Sprintf("UPDATE \"config_templates\" SET %s WHERE %s",
		strmangle.SetParamNames("\"", "\"", 1, colNames),
		strmangle.WhereClauseRepeated(string(dialect.LQ), string(dialect.RQ), len(colNames)+1, configTemplatePrimaryKeyColumns, len(o)))

	if boil.IsDebug(ctx) {
		writer := boil.DebugWriterFrom(ctx)
		fmt.Fprintln(writer, sql)
		fmt.Fprintln(writer, args...)
	}
	result, err := exec.ExecContext(ctx, sql, args...)
	if err != nil {
		return 0, errors.Wrap(err, "models: unable to update all in configTemplate slice")
	}

	rowsAff, err := result.RowsAffected()
	if err != nil {
		return 0, errors.Wrap(err, "models: unable to retrieve rows affected all in update all configTemplate")
	}
	return rowsAff, nil
}

// Upsert attempts an insert using an executor, and does an update or ignore on conflict.
// See boil.Columns documentation for how to properly use updateColumns and insertColumns.
func (o *ConfigTemplate) Upsert(ctx context.Context, exec boil.ContextExecutor, updateOnConflict bool, conflictColumns []string, updateColumns, insertColumns boil.Columns) error {
	if o == nil {
		return errors.New("models: no config_templates provided for upsert")
	}
	if !boil.TimestampsAreSkipped(ctx) {
		currTime := time.Now().In(boil.GetLocation())

		if o.CreatedAt.IsZero() {
			o.CreatedAt = currTime
		}
	}

	if err := o.doBeforeUpsertHooks(ctx, exec); err != nil {
		return err
	}

	nzDefaults := queries.NonZeroDefaultSet(configTemplateColumnsWithDefault, o)

	// Build cache key in-line uglily - mysql vs psql problems
	buf := strmangle.GetBuffer()
	if updateOnConflict {
		buf.WriteByte('t')
	} else {
		buf.WriteByte('f')
	}
	buf.WriteByte('.')
	for _, c := range conflictColumns {
		buf.WriteString(c)
	}
	buf.WriteByte('.')
	buf.WriteString(strconv.Itoa(updateColumns.Kind))
	for _, c := range updateColumns.Cols {
		buf.WriteString(c)
	}
	buf.WriteByte('.')
	buf.WriteString(strconv.Itoa(insertColumns.Kind))
	for _, c := range insertColumns.Cols {
		buf.WriteString(c)
	}
	buf.WriteByte('.')
	for _, c := range nzDefaults {
		buf.WriteString(c)
	}
	key := buf.String()
	strmangle.PutBuffer(buf)

	configTemplateUpsertCacheMut.RLock()
	cache, cached := configTemplateUpsertCache[key]
	configTemplateUpsertCacheMut.RUnlock()

	var err error

	if !cached {
		insert, ret := insertColumns.InsertColumnSet(
			configTemplateAllColumns,
			configTemplateColumnsWithDefault,
			configTemplateColumnsWithoutDefault,
			nzDefaults,
		)
		update := updateColumns.UpdateColumnSet(
			configTemplateAllColumns,
			configTemplatePrimaryKeyColumns,
		)

		if updateOnConflict && len(update) == 0 {
			return errors.New("models: unable to upsert config_templates, could not build update column list")
		}

		conflict := conflictColumns
		if len(conflict) == 0 {
			conflict = make([]string, len(configTemplatePrimaryKeyColumns))
			copy(conflict, configTemplatePrimaryKeyColumns)
		}
		cache.query = buildUpsertQueryPostgres(dialect, "\"config_templates\"", updateOnConflict, ret, update, conflict, insert)

		cache.valueMapping, err = queries.BindMapping(configTemplateType, configTemplateMapping, insert)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		if len(ret) != 0 {
			cache.retMapping, err = queries.BindMapping(configTemplateType, configTemplateMapping, ret)
			if err != nil {
				return err
			}
		}
	}

	value := reflect.Indirect(reflect.ValueOf(o))
	vals := queries.ValuesFromMapping(value, cache.valueMapping)
	var returns []interface{}
	if len(cache.retMapping) != 0 {
		returns = queries.PtrsFromMapping(value, cache.retMapping)
	}

	if boil.IsDebug(ctx) {
		writer := boil.DebugWriterFrom(ctx)
		fmt.Fprintln(writer, cache.query)
		fmt.Fprintln(writer, vals)
	}
	if len(cache.retMapping) != 0 {
		err = exec.QueryRowContext(ctx, cache.query, vals...).Scan(returns...)
		if err == sql.ErrNoRows {
			err = nil // Postgres doesn't return anything when there's no update
		}
	} else {
		_, err = exec.ExecContext(ctx, cache.query, vals...)
	}
	if err != nil {
		return errors.Wrap(err, "models: unable to upsert config_templates")
	}

	if !cached {
		configTemplateUpsertCacheMut.Lock()
		configTemplateUpsertCache[key] = cache
		configTemplateUpsertCacheMut.Unlock()
	}

	return o.doAfterUpsertHooks(ctx, exec)
}

// Delete deletes a single ConfigTemplate record with an executor.
// Delete will match against the primary key column to find the record to delete.
func (o *ConfigTemplate) Delete(ctx context.Context, exec boil.ContextExecutor) (int64, error) {
	if o == nil {
		return 0, errors.New("models: no ConfigTemplate provided for delete")
	}

	if err := o.doBeforeDeleteHooks(ctx, exec); err != nil {
		return 0, err
	}

	args := queries.ValuesFromMapping(reflect.Indirect(reflect.ValueOf(o)), configTemplatePrimaryKeyMapping)
	sql := "DELETE FROM \"config_templates\" WHERE \"id\"=$1"

	if boil.IsDebug(ctx) {
		writer := boil.DebugWriterFrom(ctx)
		fmt.Fprintln(writer, sql)
		fmt.Fprintln(writer, args...)
	}
	result, err := exec.ExecContext(ctx, sql, args...)
	if err != nil {
		return 0, errors.Wrap(err, "models: unable to delete from config_templates")
	}

	rowsAff, err := result.RowsAffected()
	if err != nil {
		return 0, errors.Wrap(err, "models: failed to get rows affected by delete for config_templates")
	}

	if err := o.doAfterDeleteHooks(ctx, exec); err != nil {
		return 0, err
	}

	return rowsAff, nil
}

// DeleteAll deletes all matching rows.
func (q configTemplateQuery) DeleteAll(ctx context.Context, exec boil.ContextExecutor) (int64, error) {
	if q.Query == nil {
		return 0, errors.New("models: no configTemplateQuery provided for delete all")
	}

	queries.SetDelete(q.Query)

	result, err := q.Query.ExecContext(ctx, exec)
	if err != nil {
		return 0, errors.Wrap(err, "models: unable to delete all from config_templates")
	}

	rowsAff, err := result.RowsAffected()
	if err != nil {
		return 0, errors.Wrap(err, "models: failed to get rows affected by deleteall for config_templates")
	}

	return rowsAff, nil
}

// DeleteAll deletes all rows in the slice, using an executor.
func (o ConfigTemplateSlice) DeleteAll(ctx context.Context, exec boil.ContextExecutor) (int64, error) {
	if len(o) == 0 {
		return 0, nil
	}

	if len(configTemplateBeforeDeleteHooks) != 0 {
		for _, obj := range o {
			if err := obj.doBeforeDeleteHooks(ctx, exec); err != nil {
				return 0, err
			}
		}
	}

	var args []interface{}
	for _, obj := range o {
		pkeyArgs := queries.ValuesFromMapping(reflect.Indirect(reflect.ValueOf(obj)), configTemplatePrimaryKeyMapping)
		args = append(args, pkeyArgs...)
	}

	sql := "DELETE FROM \"config_templates\" WHERE " +
		strmangle.WhereClauseRepeated(string(dialect.LQ), string(dialect.RQ), 1, configTemplatePrimaryKeyColumns, len(o))

	if boil.IsDebug(ctx) {
		writer := boil.DebugWriterFrom(ctx)
		fmt.Fprintln(writer, sql)
		fmt.Fprintln(writer, args)
	}
	result, err := exec.ExecContext(ctx, sql, args...)
	if err != nil {
		return 0, errors.Wrap(err, "models: unable to delete all from configTemplate slice")
	}

	rowsAff, err := result.RowsAffected()
	if err != nil {
		return 0, errors.Wrap(err, "models: failed to get rows affected by deleteall for config_templates")
	}

	if len(configTemplateAfterDeleteHooks) != 0 {
		for _, obj := range o {
			if err := obj.doAfterDeleteHooks(ctx, exec); err != nil {
				return 0, err
			}
		}
	}

	return rowsAff, nil
}

// Reload refetches the object from the database
// using the primary keys with an executor.
func (o *ConfigTemplate) Reload(ctx context.Context, exec boil.ContextExecutor) error {
	ret, err := FindConfigTemplate(ctx, exec, o.ID)
	if err != nil {
		return err
	}

	*o = *ret
	return nil
}

// ReloadAll refetches every row with matching primary key column values
// and overwrites the original object slice with the newly updated slice.
func (o *ConfigTemplateSlice) ReloadAll(ctx context.Context, exec boil.ContextExecutor) error {
	if o == nil || len(*o) == 0 {
		return nil
	}

	slice := ConfigTemplateSlice{}
	var args []interface{}
	for _, obj := range *o {
		pkeyArgs := queries.ValuesFromMapping(reflect.Indirect(reflect.ValueOf(obj)), configTemplatePrimaryKeyMapping)
		args = append(args, pkeyArgs...)
	}

	sql := "SELECT \"config_templates\".* FROM \"config_templates\" WHERE " +
		strmangle.WhereClauseRepeated(string(dialect.LQ), string(dialect.RQ), 1, configTemplatePrimaryKeyColumns, len(*o))

	q := queries.Raw(sql, args...)

	err := q.Bind(ctx, exec, &slice)
	if err != nil {
		return errors.Wrap(err, "models: unable to reload all in ConfigTemplateSlice")
	}

	*o = slice

	return nil
}

// ConfigTemplateExists checks if the ConfigTemplate row exists.
func ConfigTemplateExists(ctx context.Context, exec boil.ContextExecutor, iD int) (bool, error) {
	var exists bool
	sql := "select exists(select 1 from \"config_templates\" where \"id\"=$1 limit 1)"

	if boil.IsDebug(ctx) {
		writer := boil.DebugWriterFrom(ctx)
		fmt.Fprintln(writer, sql)
		fmt.Fprintln(writer, iD)
	}
	row := exec.QueryRowContext(ctx, sql, iD)

	err := row.Scan(&exists)
	if err != nil {
		return false, errors.Wrap(err, "models: unable to check if config_templates exists")
	}

	return exists, nil
}

func (o *ConfigTemplate) E() *ConfigTemplateE {
	return &ConfigTemplateE{S: o}
}

func ConfigTemplateEditor() *ConfigTemplateE {
	return &ConfigTemplateE{S: &ConfigTemplate{}}
}

type ConfigTemplateE struct {
	S       *ConfigTemplate
	columns []string
}

func (e *ConfigTemplateE) Insert(ctx context.Context, exec boil.ContextExecutor) error {
	return e.S.Insert(ctx, exec, boil.Whitelist(e.columns...))
}

func (e *ConfigTemplateE) Update(ctx context.Context, exec boil.ContextExecutor) (int64, error) {
	return e.S.Update(ctx, exec, boil.Whitelist(e.columns...))
}

func (e *ConfigTemplateE) ID(id int) *ConfigTemplateE {
	e.S.ID = id
	e.columns = append(e.columns, ConfigTemplateColumns.ID)
	return e
}

func (e *ConfigTemplateE) Title(title string) *ConfigTemplateE {
	e.S.Title = title
	e.columns = append(e.columns, ConfigTemplateColumns.Title)
	return e
}

func (e *ConfigTemplateE) Config(config string) *ConfigTemplateE {
	e.S.Config = config
	e.columns = append(e.columns, ConfigTemplateColumns.Config)
	return e
}

func (e *ConfigTemplateE) CreatedAt(createdAt time.Time) *ConfigTemplateE {
	e.S.CreatedAt = createdAt
	e.columns = append(e.columns, ConfigTemplateColumns.CreatedAt)
	return e
}
